title: San Antonio Missions National Historical Park: Planning
body: Planning       The following links will take you to planning processes and management documents for San Antonio Missions National Historical Park.      Public Meetings (no meetings scheduled at this time) Comment and Review (none at this time)      Reassessing Cultural Extinction: Change and Survival at Mission San Juan Capistrano, Texas, 2001  Table of Content Chapters 1 - 3  Chapters 4 - 7 Chapters 8 -10 Appendices A - C Appendices D - H
